arts.ttl: The Cyle Larin show sees ten-man Mallorca go fifth
arts.sum: Real Mallorca played for an hour with ten men on Saturday night against Champions League side Girona, winning 2-1 in a game that Mallorquinistas will remember for a long time. Minutes later, Muriqi was through on goal and instead of finishing the chance himself, he squared the ball to Cyle Larin but the pass was wayward and a golden opportunity was missed.

arts.ttl: Manchester United ‘in direct contact’ over winter deal for Girona star
arts.sum: The powers that be at Premier League giants Manchester United are actively working towards a deal for Girona star Miguel Gutiérrez. That’s according to transfer insider Rudy Galetti, who has…

arts.ttl: Last home game for Real Mallorca for six weeks
arts.sum: If Mallorca get past this round of 32 teams (playing 16 games) in what has over the years been our favourite competition, we would once again be in with a shout of reaching another cup final. Real Madrid, Barcelona plus Athletic Club and Mallorca enter this round after being exempt in the previous ones as they are the four that will play in the S panish Super Cup in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia between January 8 – 12.
Joe Champion has provided a score prediction for all 10 matches taking place in LaLiga on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Official: Girona beat Arsenal & Chelsea to Vladyslav Krapivtsov signing
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Girona have on Thursday announced a fresh addition to the club’s ranks between the posts. The player to have put pen to paper on terms with the…

arts.ttl: Mallorca homeless: Living in Palma Airport
arts.sum: One of the homeless people says that the airport is safe . And so a small group of homeless people share their lives under one roof - that of the airport.
